geographical_features: access to the Indian Ocean; major rivers (Ganges, Brahmaputra); Himalayas in the north; diverse landscapes and climate zones
climate: tropical monsoon, arid in the northwest, temperate in the Himalayas
economic_strengths: rapidly growing economy; ICT services; pharmaceuticals; textiles; agriculture; space program; large skilled workforce; emerging manufacturing hub
digitalization_level: high and rapidly improving — strong fintech and digital ID infrastructure
political_economic_threats: infrastructure pressures from rapid urbanization; border tensions with Pakistan and China; internal political polarization; climate vulnerability
military_threats: border conflicts, terrorism, maritime security challenges
development_milestones: world’s largest democracy; major tech and service economy; rapidly expanding infrastructure and industrial base
